title: 09/23/21 DPS Best Of
itunes:title: 09/23/21 DPS Best Of
description:
On Today's Dan Patrick Show, DP talks to Pro Football Focus' Steve Palazzolo about the best kick returner in NFL history. Who Steve says is the best may surprise you. Pat Forde checks in about the College Football Playoffs decision to not vote on a 12 team playoff. And Brandel Chamblee calls in from the Ryder cup to help set the scene for the start of it tomorrow.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
